title: Ellie In Space X Teslarati (double interview)
summary: Ellie In Space is more than a YouTube channel dedicated to SpaceX and space in general. The host, Ellie, has a unique...

title: Entire NASA astronaut corps eligible for Artemis missions
summary: As NASA prepares to select the crew of the second Artemis mission, the agency’s chief astronaut says the entire astronaut corps, and not a previously announced subset, is eligible for that flight  and future missions to the moon.

title: Curiosity marks 10 years on Mars as discoveries continue
summary: After successfully landing on Mars on August 6, 2012 (UTC), Curiosity continues to unlock the secrets of the Red Planet as the vehicle explores Gale Crater. Since landing, the rover has traveled over 17.5 miles (28.1 km) and made multiple scientific discoveries. Curiosity is now in the process of exploring and traversing Mount Sharp, the 5.5-kilometer-high mountain that lies in the center of Gale Crater.

title: Italian satellite may fly NASA Earth science payload
summary: NASA is in talks with the Italian Space Agency to fly an Earth science instrument originally planned to go on a commercial smallsat.

title: Space Development Agency to take another stab at space-to-aircraft laser communications
summary: SDA is seeking proposals for a demonstration of laser communications between orbiting satellites and aircraft in flight
